title: Jack and the Beanstalk
short_plot_summary: A boy named Jack trades his cow for magic beans, grows a giant beanstalk, and ventures into a castle in the sky, where he steals from a giant and brings back treasure to his home.
explanation: A boy, representing Jack, the main character of the story
A seedling, symbolizing the magic beans Jack receives in exchange for his cow
A leaf, illustrating the growth of the giant beanstalk from the magic beans
A castle, representing the giant's home in the sky that Jack explores
An egg, signifying the treasures Jack steals from the giant, like the goose that lays golden eggs
